name: Lightning Out
tagline: Docs and samples for Lightning Out
body:
### Welcome to Lightning Out
This repository contains samples, documentation, and other resources for Lightning Out.

### Authors and Contributors
Doug Chasman @dutchchasman is a Salesforce Distinguished Engineer and Force.com architect, and is the inventor of Lightning Out and other Salesforce technologies.
Skip Sauls (@skipsauls) is a Director of Product Management for Salesforce and is the PM/PO for Lightning Components and Lightning Out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
